articles.description: Some are asking when does Gwen come out in League of Legends, and here you'll find the abilities and release date for The Hallowed Seamstress in LoL.
articles.content: League of Legends is one of the biggest video game series on the market and fans should be excited about the Wild Rift open beta set to kick off on March 29th. While this open beta will be available … [+2218 chars]
